title: IELTS Academic Writing Test
instructions: You have 60 minutes to complete both tasks. Spend about 20 minutes on Task 1 and 40 minutes on Task 2.

tasks.title: Writing Task 1: Academic
tasks.description: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task. Write at least 150 words.
tasks.task:
The chart below shows the percentage of households in different income brackets in Country X from 2010 to 2020.

Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.

chartData.title: Household Income Distribution in Country X (2010-2020)

criteria.taskAchievement: Address all parts of the task, present clear overview, highlight key features
criteria.coherenceCohesion: Organize information logically, use cohesive devices effectively
criteria.lexicalResource: Use vocabulary flexibly and precisely, avoid repetition
criteria.grammaticalRange: Use variety of sentence structures, ensure accuracy

tasks.title: Writing Task 2: Academic
tasks.description: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task. Write at least 250 words.
tasks.task:
Some people believe that governments should spend money on public transportation systems, while others think that private companies should be responsible for providing transport services.

Discuss both views and give your own opinion.

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.

criteria.taskAchievement: Address all parts of the task, present clear position, develop ideas fully
criteria.coherenceCohesion: Organize ideas logically, use cohesive devices, ensure clear progression
criteria.lexicalResource: Use vocabulary flexibly and precisely, demonstrate range and accuracy
criteria.grammaticalRange: Use variety of sentence structures, ensure grammatical accuracy

additionalTasks.title: Writing Task 1: Process Diagram
additionalTasks.task:
The diagram below shows the process of how coffee is produced and prepared for sale in supermarkets and shops.

Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.
processSteps: Coffee beans are harvested from coffee plants
Beans are dried in the sun for several days
Dried beans are roasted at high temperatures
Roasted beans are ground into fine powder
Ground coffee is packaged in bags or containers
Packaged coffee is transported to supermarkets
Coffee is sold to consumers in retail stores

additionalTasks.title: Writing Task 2: Problem-Solution
additionalTasks.description: Alternative Task 2 - Problem and solution essay
additionalTasks.task:
In many countries, the number of people choosing to live alone has increased significantly in recent years.

What are the causes of this trend? Do you think it is a positive or negative development?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.

causes: Technology enabling remote work and social connection
